title: 3kpk3
author: 3kpk3
content: This is my second random giveaway which is a bit different this time around to improve the entertainment factor. Provide any AI generated image or text(Copying from online sources is allowed).I will select the ones that appeal to me the most and add them to Bitmover's tool in order to acquire a randomised result.Escrow(Personal wallet): https://bitref.com/bc1qcay6pst9y53gaxk5yuwkkad6c9vccs0z3ckvz5Rules:- Provide AI image/text and BTC address.- I'll be using Bitmover's tool for full transparency.- Minimum 3 merit in last 120 days required to participate.- Accounts registered before July 1st, 2023 are eligible.- Giveaway will run until July 30th, 11:30 AM PT.

comments.body: I've found the limitations of AI (https://deepai.org/), see what I asked for¬† For easy requirement, the result is interesting.For something a bit more complicated, the result is ... ... ?! (I never thought that a slightly neurotic fish can look like a bear holding a stick, lol)I also managed some interesting overall images, but getting a fish hold a bitcoin seems to remain a challenge.
